subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Newton led the Panthers to a 15-1 record in the regular season on the way to winning the league’s Most Valuable Player Award. But then he faced the Denver Broncos’ exceptionally powerful defense.
snippet: Newton led the Panthers to a 15-1 record in the regular season on the way to winning the league’s Most Valuable Player Award. But then he faced the Denver Broncos’ exceptionally powerful defense.
